messages: 95cc64dd2825f9df13ec4ad683ecf339 (21:18): how do I increase heap size for tomcat ?
95cc64dd2825f9df13ec4ad683ecf339 (21:18): i have this error:  INFO  [service.descriptor.DescriptorService] Alfresco JVM - v1.5.0_08-b03; maximum heap size 63.563MB
95cc64dd2825f9df13ec4ad683ecf339 (21:21): i wanna it to be default value
a4b88438a9db86082488664c9bda1ae5 (21:22): You probably want to set up the options as JAVA_OPTS in the environment that will call catalina.sh...
a4b88438a9db86082488664c9bda1ae5 (21:23): That way you can upgrade tomcat without having to muck around...
